00029 using robot::sim::Puma;

00032 // local classes
00033 class Puma::PumaManipulator : public robot::SerialManipulator
00034 {
00035 public:
00036   PumaManipulator();
00037   virtual String className() const { return String("PumaManipulator"); }
00038   virtual Object& clone() const { return *NewObj PumaManipulator(*this); } 
00039 
00040   virtual Matrix4 getBaseTransform() const { Matrix4 I; I.setIdentity(); return I; }
00041 
00042   virtual const Parameters& getParameters() const
00043     { return parameters; }
00044   
00045 protected:
00046   PumaManipulator(const PumaManipulator& m) 
00047     : SerialManipulator(m),  parameters(m.parameters)
00048   {}
00049 
00050   Parameters parameters;
00051 };

00055 {
00056 public:
00057   PumaPlatform();

00059   virtual Object& clone() const { return *NewObj PumaPlatform(*this); }

00066 
00067 // implementation
00068 
00069 Puma::PumaManipulator::PumaManipulator()
00070 {
00071   // D-H parameters for Puma (see "Robotics", K.S.FU, R.C.Gonzalez & C.S.G Lee, pp37)
00072   Parameters p(6); // 6dof
00073 
00074   const Real Pi = Consts::Pi;
00075   const JointParameters::JointType rev = JointParameters::Revolute;
00076 
00077   p[0] = JointParameters(rev, -Pi/2.0, 0,0,Pi/2.0,Math::degToRad(-160),Math::degToRad(160));
00078   p[1] = JointParameters(rev, 0,431.8/1000.0, 149.09/1000.0,0,Math::degToRad(-225),Math::degToRad(45));
00079   p[2] = JointParameters(rev, Pi/2.0, -20.32/1000.0,0,Pi/2.0,Math::degToRad(-45),Math::degToRad(225));
00080   p[3] = JointParameters(rev, -Pi/2.0, 0,433.07/1000.0,0,Math::degToRad(-110),Math::degToRad(170));
00081   p[4] = JointParameters(rev, Pi/2.0,0,0,0,Math::degToRad(-100),Math::degToRad(100));
00082   p[5] = JointParameters(rev, 0,0,56.25/1000.0,0,Math::degToRad(-266),Math::degToRad(266));
00083   
00084   parameters = p;
00085 }
00086 
00087 
00088 Puma::PumaPlatform::PumaPlatform()
00089 {
00090   mobile=holonomic=false;
00091   dimensions = base::Dimension3();
00092 }
00093

00095 
00096 
00097 Puma::Puma()
00098 {
00099   name = String("Puma");
00100   platform = ref<PumaPlatform>(NewObj PumaPlatform());
00101   manipulators.push_back(ref<PumaManipulator>(NewObj PumaManipulator()));
00102   manipulatorOffsets.push_back(Vector3());
00103 }
